de.hft_stuttgart.spirit.android.view

Class Filter_Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hft_stuttgart.spirit.android.view.Filter_Activity

  • public class Filter_Activity
extends java.lang.Object
    This activity is used to filter the Stories in the StoryListInstalled_Fragment and StoryListStore_Fragment.
    Author:
    Stefan

      • DateTextWatcher

        private TextWatcher DateTextWatcher
        The DateTextWatcher displays a toast message if the inserted creationDateMin is > creationDateMax, because no stories can be between creationDateMin and creationDateMax if: "creationDateMin > creationDateMax".

      • min_dateListener

        private DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener min_dateListener
        The min_dateListener gets the date from the DatePicker and puts it separated by ". " into a String.

        The max_dateListener gets the date from the DatePicker and puts it separated by ". " into a String.
